thig3.5:1.1_0: “You cry ‘Please be living!’ in the forest.
thig3.5:1.2_0: Ubbirī, get a hold of yourself!
thig3.5:1.5_0: have been burnt in this funeral ground:
thig3.5:1.6_0: which one do you grieve for?”
thig3.5:2.1_0: “Give me permission to such a dart
thig3.5:2.3_0: You’ve swept away the grief for my daughter
thig3.5:2.4_0: in which I once was mired.
thig3.5:3.3_0: Revering the Buddha and the teaching,
thig3.5:3.4_0: to his teaching, and to the Sangha.”
